name: SCP Advanced
description:
SCP Advanced is a retro styled SCP interaction simulator. SCPs are anomalous objects that are being contained by the SCP Foundation. You play as a Class-D personal, a death row inmate used in experiments.

The SCP Foundation has given you access to around 30 SCPs to interact with. The goal is not to win, but rather to see what each SCP does. To begin, enter the correct SCP number to enter the containment cell of your desired SCP. Keep in mind that you only have access to a select few.

Happy testing!
